attributes.action: Provide PPE for all Sonographers during the Covid 19 pandemic.
attributes.additional_details:
to prolonged, close contact to patients. Current guidance suggests PPE is only required for suspected/confirmed C-19 but sonographers are regularly less than 2 metres away from asymptomatic patients who can still spread the virus.
These services can’t stop during this pandemic, but without adequate PPE, we can’t protect ourselves or our patients from this deadly virus. Please sign our petition and lobby the government to provide better PPE guidance and equipment for the ultrasound workforce
attributes.background: 10.2 million ultrasounds were performed in England in 2018/2019, including timely screening for congenital fetal abnormalities, and essential cancer diagnoses.
